name: The Bound of Time - #lowrezjam 2014
description:
The Bound of Time is a tiny action-adventure-platformer and was made for #lowrezjam (32x32px) back in 2014. There a some bugs, unfortunately the source code is lost to fix them, but the game should be still playable.

Controls:

  • left and right key for move
  • up key for jump
  • spacebar for attack
  • "s" key for switching the time
  • and "m" for mute

Thanks to Arnold, Björn & Marina for testing :)

Music from: PlayOnLoop.com
Sound from: www.freesound.org and freesfx.co.uk
